attributes.action: ILR should be 5 years for those who are  already in uk on skilled worker visa.
attributes.additional_details: Because they promise us that they will give us ILR in 5 years why they are breaking there promise this new law should be for new ones not for those who is already paying community from last 4.5 years.
attributes.background: Government should consider those who is paying the community from last 5 years and this law should be for new commers . Govt promised us to give us ilr in 5 years .

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751505
